ComicInfo.Summary: Nightmare in Niagara Falls!: The Hulk tracks Betty and Talbot to Niagara Falls where they are celebrating their honeymoon. Tiger Shark, who is also hiding out at the Falls, attacks Hulk thinking he is working with the Sub-Mariner.
